resources.string: How much do you know about the car you drive? Test your car knowledge by taking our car knowledge quiz.
Looking at the above picture, what would be the maximum air pressure for inflation of this tire?
How many pistons does a 8 cylinder engine have?
Looking at the under the hood picture above, where would I check the oil level of this engine?
Choose two items that I should look at if I am having electrical problems?
What is the name for the item pictured above?
What does the small sideways triangle(circled above in red) indicate?
What is the name for the item pictured above?
Of the 4 items listed below, in a normally functioning braking system, what is the first part to wear?
Which of the items pictured above are apart of an automotive exhaust system?
Which 2 items pictured above would it be considered routine maintenance to replace them?
Congratulations, you have reached the finish line!!
